companyName: PowerShares S&P SmallCap Health Care Portfolio
description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P SmallCap 600® Capped Health Care Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks of small capitalization U.S. healthcare companies that comprise the underlying index. These companies are principally engaged in the business of providing healthcare-related products, facilities and services, including biotechnology, pharmaceuticals, medical technology and supplies.
